title: Enchanted isles
creator_credit: Films of Scotland Committee and Anglo-Scottish Pictures
brief_description: A tour of the Hebrides, starting from Oban and crossing the water to Iona, St Columba’s Isle, and to Staffa and Fingal’s cave. The birthplace of Flora MacDonald and memories of Bonnie Prince Charlie. Also shows the industry and agriculture of the islands, including the weaving of Harris tweed.
